name: RetrieveAudienceContactList
description:
Retrieve contacts for a specific marketing audience.

Use this tool to obtain a list of omni-channel contacts associated with a particular audience in your marketing campaigns.

parameters.name: audience_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the specific audience to retrieve contacts. Ensure this ID corresponds to an existing audience.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the audience.

parameters.name: fields_to_return
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to include in the response, using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields_list
parameters.description: Comma-separated fields to exclude from the response, using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: number_of_records_to_return
parameters.description: Specifies how many records to return, from 10 to 1000.

value_schema.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Paginate through records using a `next_cursor` from a previous request. By default, fetches the first page.

value_schema.description: Paginate through a collection of records by setting the `cursor` parameter to a `next_cursor` attribute returned by a previous request. Default value fetches the first "page" of results.

parameters.name: created_before_datetime
parameters.description: Restricts the response to contacts created at or before the specified time. Use ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restricts the response to contacts created at or before the specified time (inclusive). Uses ISO 8601 format: 2025-04-23T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: created_since
parameters.description: Restrict contacts to those created after this timestamp (exclusive). Use ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restricts the response to contacts created after the specified time (exclusive). Uses ISO 8601 format: 2025-04-23T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: restrict_by_update_date_before
parameters.description: Restricts the response to contacts updated at or before the specified date and time, using ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restricts the response to contacts updated at or before the specified time (inclusive). Uses ISO 8601 format: 2025-04-23T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: updated_since
parameters.description: Restrict response to contacts updated after this time using ISO 8601 format (exclusive).

value_schema.description: Restricts the response to contacts updated after the specified time (exclusive). Uses ISO 8601 format: 2025-04-23T15:41:36+00:00.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

value_schema.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

parameters.description: Paginate through a collection of records by setting the `cursor` parameter to a `next_cursor` attribute returned by a previous request. Default value fetches the first "page" of results.

value_schema.description: Paginate through a collection of records by setting the `cursor` parameter to a `next_cursor` attribute returned by a previous request. Default value fetches the first "page" of results.

parameters.description: Restricts the response to contacts created at or before the specified time (inclusive). Uses ISO 8601 format: 2025-04-23T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restricts the response to contacts created after the specified time (exclusive). Uses ISO 8601 format: 2025-04-23T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: updated_before
parameters.description: Restricts the response to contacts updated at or before the specified time (inclusive). Uses ISO 8601 format: 2025-04-23T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restricts the response to contacts updated at or before the specified time (inclusive). Uses ISO 8601 format: 2025-04-23T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.description: Restricts the response to contacts updated after the specified time (exclusive). Uses ISO 8601 format: 2025-04-23T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restricts the response to contacts updated after the specified time (exclusive). Uses ISO 8601 format: 2025-04-23T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.description: The unique ID for the audience.
